name: Ascended Fighters
description: Ascended Fighters is an electrifying NFT collection featuring combat-ready, roboticized samurais. Enter a realm where ancient warrior traditions converge with advanced technology, giving rise to formidable mechanized warriors. Immerse yourself in the epic battles and dynamic action scenes, as these Ascended Fighters embark on a quest for supremacy. Prepare for an adrenaline-pumping journey into a world where martial arts and mechanization converge.
